item.title: @elonmusk: What's currently going on at@moltbookis genuinely the most incredible sci-fi takeoff-adjacent thing ...
item.description: What's currently going on at@moltbookis genuinely the most incredible sci-fi takeoff-adjacent thing I have seen recently. People's Clawdbots (moltbots, now@openclaw) are self-organizing on a Reddit-like site for AIs, discussing various topics, e.g. even how to speak privately.

item.title: @elonmusk: Grok Imagine is improving super fast! What are the highest priority improvements you want? Please re...
item.description: Grok Imagine is improving super fast! What are the highest priority improvements you want? Please reply below.

item.description: Exactly

item.title: @elonmusk: The choice before us is unavoidable. The United States can remain a nation governed by law, or we ca...
item.description: The choice before us is unavoidable. The United States can remain a nation governed by law, or we can allow the law to dissolve into suggestion — as my Democrat colleagues would have it. The future belongs to countries that believe in themselves enough to enforce their laws.

item.title: @elonmusk: One of the greatest lies in our culture at the moment is that allowing lawlessness is compassionate ...
item.description: One of the greatest lies in our culture at the moment is that allowing lawlessness is compassionate and enforcing the law is cruel.

item.title: @elonmusk: Last night I saw, “MELANIA,” for the second time. The audience loved it, and so do I. Check it out —...
item.description: Last night I saw, “MELANIA,” for the second time. The audience loved it, and so do I. Check it out — A MUST SEE!amazon.com/salp/melaniamovie…

item.description: Celebrities, I know it’s very important to you that you feel that you’re making a difference, and you are, you’re making independents vote Republican.

item.title: @elonmusk: The satellites will actually be so far apart that it will be hard to see from one to another. Space ...
item.description: The satellites will actually be so far apart that it will be hard to see from one to another. Space is so vast as to be beyond comprehension.

item.description: 100GW/year of solar-powered AI satellites requires 100GW/year of AI computers …

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON MUSK: "I do see a path to 100 gigawatts a year of AI powered space solar satellites. If you do ...
item.description: ELON MUSK: "I do see a path to 100 gigawatts a year of AI powered space solar satellites. If you do a million tons of payload to orbit per year with 100 kilowatts per ton, that's 100 gigawatts of solar powered AI satellites per year. There's a path to get to a terawatt per year, then you want to make those AI satellites on the moon and use a mass driver. We should scale solar substantially in the US. Tesla and SpaceX are scaling solar, and I encourage others to do so as well."

item.title: @elonmusk: Elon Musk is operating on another timeline right now. We are living through perhaps the most pivotal...
item.description: Elon Musk is operating on another timeline right now. We are living through perhaps the most pivotal moment in humanity. Optimism is a beautiful thing.

item.title: @elonmusk: SpaceX says it aims to deploy up to 1 million orbital satellite data centers in space to provide eno...
item.description: SpaceX says it aims to deploy up to 1 million orbital satellite data centers in space to provide enough compute power for large-scale AI inference and training. • Satellites will get constant power in space. • No batteries are needed. • No glass framing required, which makes the solar panels cheaper to produce. • Passive Radiative cooling Elon says space will be the lowest-cost place to put AI within 3 years.

item.title: @elonmusk: Awesome detail from the SpaceX orbital datacenter filing - heliocentric disposal of satellites at th...
item.description: Awesome detail from the SpaceX orbital datacenter filing - heliocentric disposal of satellites at their end of life. This is necessary long term and is something we've been talking about for a while. You can't re-enter that amount of mass without causing problems.

item.title: @elonmusk: The ones committing the fraud are the ones complaining the loudest
item.description: The ones committing the fraud are the ones complaining the loudest
